description: This schema represents a survey as an array of at least one survey item (the combination of a question and the list of its possible answers).

items.description: The list of questions and answers that make up this survey.

delivery_details.description: The operational details of delivering this survey.

start_date_time.description: The date time at which this survey was started.

end_date_time.description: The date time at which this survey was finished (not necessarily completed).

end_status.description: The way this survey was ended by the participant. Abandoned means some answers were provided. Missed means no answers were provided.

score.description: The score calculated for the survey: this can be a number or a combination of numbers and/or string.
